docs.summary: Describes the SEO Keyword Suggestions SPI.

This endpoint requests information about remaining quota in the plan. 
 A Wix user can purchase a paid plan from your site or utilize a free plan 
 if you offer one. 
 You provide information about the current plan including how many searches remain 
 out of the total in the plan, the dates of the plan, and whether the user currently has a paid plan.

 Wix calls this endpoint when a Wix user opens the SEO page of the Dashboard.

> You cannot try out this endpoint because it has to be implemented by an app and can 
> have an arbitrary URL. So please ignore the **Authorization** and **POST** sections below 
> as well as the **Try It Out** button.

params.name: keyword
params.doc: Keyword to analyze for SEO strength.

params.name: countryCode
params.doc:
Specific country for analysis. 

 2-letter country code in
 [ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements)
 format.

docs.summary:
This endpoint requests keyword suggestions for a specified phrase. 
 You provide statistical data about the requested keyword and a list of similar keywords 
 so the user can compare the SEO strength of the suggested keywords. 
 
 Wix calls this endpoint when a Wix user requests data about a keyword via the SEO page of the Dashboard.
 
 
> You cannot try out this endpoint because it has to be implemented by an app and can 
> have an arbitrary URL. So please ignore the **Authorization** and **POST** sections below 
> as well as the **Try It Out** button.

members.name: keyword
members.doc: Keyword to analyze for SEO strength.

members.name: countryCode
members.doc:
Specific country for analysis. 

 2-letter country code in
 [ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements)
 format.

members.name: keyword
members.doc: **Required**. Keyword suggestions offered by the SEO tool.

members.name: volume
members.doc: **Required**. Average number of searches per month for the keyword.

members.name: difficulty
members.doc:
**Required**. Indicates how competitive the keyword is and how difficult to rank in an organic search. A higher difficulty means the keyword has a lower search ranking.
Min: `1`
Max: `100`

members.name: latestTrends
members.doc:
**Required**. Trends in searches for the keyword per month over the last 12 months. Must include exactly 12 values. Typically, the trend values represent the number of searches relative to the peak search volume. A value of `1.0` represents the highest search volume for the term. A value of `0.50` means that there were half as many searches.
Min: `0.0`
Max: `1.0`

members.name: searcherIntent
members.doc:
User's reason for searching for the keyword (optional): 
 - `COMMERCIAL`: Users searched for specific brands or services, usually with an intent to purchase.
 - `INFORMATIONAL`: Users searched for information about a topic.
 - `NAVIGATIONAL`: Users searched for a specific page, site, or physical location.
 - `TRANSACTIONAL`: Users searched to perform a transaction, for example a purchase.

members.name: quota
members.doc: **Required if `quotaEnabled` is `true` in the configuration**. Information about remaining credit in the plan.

members.name: remaining
members.doc: **Required**. Number of searches left until the end of the current quota cycle.

members.name: limit
members.doc: **Required**. Total number of searches available in the current quota cycle.

members.name: startDate
members.doc: **Required**. Start date and time of the current quota cycle as UTC datetime in `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm[:ss][.sss]Z` format.

members.name: endDate
members.doc:
**Required**. End date and time of the current quota cycle as UTC datetime in `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm[:ss][.sss]Z` format. 
 After this time, the quota is reset

members.name: paidPlan
members.doc:
**Required**. Whether the user currently has a paid plan.
 If `false`, the user is offered an upgrade using the `upgradeUrl` from the configuration.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • COMMERCIAL
  • INFORMATIONAL
  • NAVIGATIONAL
  • TRANSACTIONAL
